forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny this morning. A few showers developing during the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies this morning will become overcast during the afternoon. Slight chance of an afternoon shower. High 57F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Slight chance of a shower late. Low 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a shower late. Low around 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 17C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain. High 14C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with showers early becoming a steady rain late. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain showers in the evening becoming steadier overnight. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain tapering to a few showers late. High 58F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low 49F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 59F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.
